title: Delicate Diamond Mangalsutra - A Modern Classic
features: A contemporary take on the traditional Mangalsutra, featuring a delicate rose gold chain interspersed with faceted black onyx beads. Five teardrop-shaped diamond pendants are evenly spaced, adding a touch of elegance and sparkle. The setting is a secure bezel setting ensuring the diamonds are safely held. Its minimalist design makes it a versatile piece.
occasions: Gifts for Newlyweds. Can be worn casually or paired with formal attire.
description: A modern interpretation of a sacred symbol, combining tradition with contemporary aesthetics. The rose gold adds a touch of warmth and sophistication, while the diamonds provide brilliance and sparkle. Lightweight and comfortable for daily wear. A meaningful and stylish piece to celebrate love and commitment.
